sentences: Mehed lõid, tagusid 'mängisid' raha peale kaarte.
Hakkas kaarte segama, jagama. Jaan, hakka kaarte tegema 'kaarte segama ja mängijatele välja jagama'!
context: The word 'mängisid' is the past tense plural form of the Estonian verb 'mängima', which means 'to play'. In this context, it specifically refers to playing cards or gambling. The dictionary entry shows that 'kaart' (card) has multiple meanings including playing cards, maps, postcards, and various types of cards. When used with 'mängisid', it indicates the action of engaging in card games or gambling activities.
